metadata.name: Royal Marriage
metadata.author: Card Game Engine
metadata.description: Classic linear solitaire where the King of Hearts works his way through the deck to meet the Queen of Hearts.

cards.note: King and Queen of Hearts are the protagonists

instructions.overview: Help the King of Hearts navigate through a line of cards to reach the Queen of Hearts. Remove cards between them to bring them together.
setup: The King of Hearts is placed at the beginning of the deck
The Queen of Hearts is placed at the end of the deck
All 50 remaining cards are shuffled and placed between them in a single row
gameplay: Cards are laid out in a single horizontal row
You can remove cards if they match by SUIT or RANK
Matching cards must be separated by exactly ONE or TWO other cards
When cards are removed, the remaining cards stay in position (gaps appear)
As gaps form, the King and Queen move closer together
Mobile Controls: Pinch with two fingers to zoom. Drag with two fingers to pan the board.
The game continues until the King and Queen are adjacent or no more moves are possible
instructions.winning: Remove all cards between the King and Queen of Hearts so they end up side-by-side with no other cards remaining.
